questions.question: The History of Assam can be divided into_____ eras.

Who was the earliest king of Pragjyotishpur?
Mahiranga was Sanskritized from
What was the ancient name of Assam mentioned in Ramayana and Mahabharata?
According to Ramayana, Amurtyaraja was the founder of the kingdom of?
Narakasura founded which dynasty?
Ghatakasura was killed by?
According to Pre-History sources, the mother of Narakasura was
Ghatakasura was a ruler of the
Who was killed by the first Naraka King Narakasura and established the Bhauma dynasty?

options: B. Kalika Purana and Yogini Tantra
C. Kaunji Khel and Yogini Tantra
questions.answer: B. Kalika Purana and Yogini Tantra

questions.question: The tantric text 'Yogini Tantra' is dedicated to the worship of two goddesses. One is kali and the other one is?
According to which of the following 'Purana', the temple of Kamakhya was in the centre of Kamarupa?
According to the Kalika Purana, Naraka the mythological ancestor of the Varman dynasty was the son of:
options: A. Varaha form of Vishnu and Bhumi
B. Kartick form of Shiv and Parborti
questions.answer: A. Varaha form of Vishnu and Bhumi

questions.question: Ranapith, Kampith, Swanapith and Saumarpith were the four divisions of the ancient Kamrupa. Which of the following historical composition mentions about these four divisions?
Hinduism was established in Pragjyotishpura by the king
Narakasura was killed by
Who killed Mura, the general of Narakasura?
According to the epic Mahabharata, who ruled the Pragjyotishpura kingdom during the Kurukshetra war?
Which Kamrupa King took part in the Battle of Kurukshetra (the Mahabharata War)
In the Battle of Kurukshetra, Bhagadatta fought on the side of
What was the name of the elephant of Bhagadatta?
What is the name of the Parva of Mahabharata which mentions the valor of Bhagadatta?
options: A. Adi Parva (The Book of the Beginning)
B. Bhishma Parva (The Book of Bhishma)
C. Drona Parva (The Book of Drona)
D. Karna Parva (The Book of Karna)
questions.answer: D. Karna Parva (The Book of Karna)

questions.question: Which of the following is the only Kamarupa dynasty's inscription that distinguishes between the b (ব) and v (ৱ) letters?

questions.question: Hiuen Tsang visited Assam during the reign of
Hiuen Tsang described which Kamrupa king as the 'Aristocratic king of eastern India'?
What is the name of the book that compares Bhaskaravarman with grandfather Bhishma?
Who was the famous teacher of Nalanda, on whose request and advice, Chinese Pilgrim Hiuen Tsang visited Kamarupa
Huen Tsang visited Assam in the year?
options: A. 640 AD, In the reign of Bhaskaravarman
B. 600 AD, In the reign of Pushyavarman
C. 626 AD, In the reign of Bhutivarman
D. 540 AD, In the reign of Bhaskaravarman
questions.answer: A. 640 AD, In the reign of Bhaskaravarman
